common_symptoms.name: headache
questions: On a scale of 1-10, how severe is the headache?
Where is the pain located (temples, forehead, back of head)?
Is it throbbing, dull, or sharp pain?
How long have you had this headache?
Any other symptoms like nausea or sensitivity to light?

common_symptoms.name: fever
questions: How long have you had the fever?
Any other symptoms like chills, sweating, or body aches?
Have you taken any medication for the fever?

common_symptoms.name: fatigue
questions: How long have you been feeling tired?
Any other symptoms like weakness or dizziness?
